__e: All my married life, there was no one else.

You know, sometimes I think I'm married to the president or something.

But I still say I'm better off being married to him than without him.
I'm saying that the right man is out there. If you don't grab him, someone else will, and you'll spend your life knowing that someone else is married to your husband.
Now, why would you want me to think that she's married to you in the first place?
